ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Gordon
ygData.msgSnippet: Who reads the bloody manuals? haha. I put 10 points into Int because I planned on doing a lot of trade skills (which I have, all are maxed or near max except
ygData.messageBody:
Who reads the bloody manuals? haha.

I put 10 points into Int because I planned on doing a lot of trade skills
(which I have, all are maxed or near max except JC which is at 107). My
point being that someone choosing a non-optimal stat distribuation for their
character can mean many more things then they no nothing about their class.

Rokenn

> I think that the printed manual says that INT is a benefit to

>
> Sylly
